alert.note: Alert for Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Itasca; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore (Minnesota) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Duluth (Northeast Minnesota and Northern Wisconsin)
info.headline: Dense Fog Advisory issued August 27 at 1:27AM CDT until August 27 at 7:00AM CDT by NWS Duluth
info.description: ...DENSE FOG ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 7 AM CDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Visibility one to two miles in dense fog. * WHERE...Central St. Louis, Southern Lake, Southern Cook, South Itasca, Northern Aitkin, Carlton and South St. Louis and Pine Counties. This includes the Tribal Lands of the Grand Portage Reservation, the Bois Forte Band, Lake Vermilion area, the Fond du Lac Band and the Mille Lacs Band, Hinckley, Big Sandy Lake and, Lena Lake areas. * WHEN...Until 7 AM CDT this morning. * IMPACTS...Hazardous driving conditions due to low visibility.
info.instruction: If driving, slow down, use your headlights, and leave plenty of distance ahead of you.

area.areaDesc: Carlton, South St. Louis; Central St. Louis; Northern Aitkin; Pine; South Itasca; Southern Cook, North Shore; Southern Lake, North Shore
